requirement_tested: Display a course catalog page with a list of available courses
user_persona: A prospective student browsing for cybersecurity courses.
user_goal: To view all available courses on the website.

narrative_steps.title: Landing on Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Sarah visits the Global Institute of Information Security website and wants to explore available courses. She notices a 'Courses' link in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Courses' link in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the course catalog page with a grid of course cards displayed against a lavender background.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing Course Cards
narrative_steps.description: Sarah scrolls through the course listings and sees several cards with titles like 'Ethical Hacking 101', each styled with indigo text and borders.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll down the course catalog page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Additional courses load dynamically as she scrolls, maintaining the lavender background and indigo-styled cards.

requirement_tested: Show detailed course information pages for each course
user_persona: A student interested in learning more about a specific cybersecurity course.
user_goal: To read detailed information about a selected course.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting a Course
narrative_steps.description: While browsing the course catalog, Alex finds a course titled 'Network Security Fundamentals' and decides to learn more by clicking on it.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Network Security Fundamentals' course card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Navigated to the detailed course page with full description, syllabus, instructor bio, and an 'Enroll Now' button styled in indigo.

requirement_tested: Enable users to enroll in courses through an online enrollment form
user_persona: A registered user ready to sign up for a cybersecurity course.
user_goal: To successfully enroll in a selected course.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Enrollment
narrative_steps.description: Jamie is logged in and viewing the details of 'Advanced Cryptography'. He clicks the 'Enroll Now' button to begin registration.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Enroll Now' button on the course detail page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An enrollment modal form appears with fields for personal information, styled with indigo components.

narrative_steps.title: Completing the Form
narrative_steps.description: Jamie fills out the required fields and checks the terms acceptance box before submitting the form.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in name, email, phone number, emergency contact, check terms box, then click Submit.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form validates inputs, processes payment if needed, creates an enrollment record, and displays a confirmation message.

requirement_tested: Implement a chatbot integration for user assistance
user_persona: A visitor needing help finding specific course information.
user_goal: To get assistance using the integrated chatbot.

narrative_steps.title: Activating Chat Support
narrative_steps.description: Taylor is confused about which courses are suitable for beginners and sees a floating chat icon at the bottom right corner of the page.
narrative_steps.action: Click the chatbot icon.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Chat interface expands with a greeting message and input field for typing questions, maintaining indigo styling.

narrative_steps.title: Asking a Question
narrative_steps.description: Taylor types a question asking for beginner-friendly courses and sends the message.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'Which courses are best for beginners?' and press send.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Message is sent via API to backend, response is generated and displayed within the chat window.

requirement_tested: Include a contact form for users to reach the institute
user_persona: A potential student wanting to inquire about course offerings.
user_goal: To submit a general inquiry to the institute.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Contact Page
narrative_steps.description: Jordan wants to ask about upcoming course schedules and finds the 'Contact' link in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Contact' link in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Directed to the contact page featuring a form with indigo-styled input fields and institute contact information in the sidebar.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Inquiry
narrative_steps.description: Jordan fills out the contact form with his name, email, subject, and message, then submits it.
narrative_steps.action: Enter details in the form fields and click the Submit button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form data is validated, saved to database, an email notification is sent to institute staff, and a success message is shown.

requirement_tested: Display certification pathways and their requirements
user_persona: A student planning a long-term educational path in cybersecurity.
user_goal: To understand the certification pathways offered by the institute.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Certification Pathways
narrative_steps.description: Casey is curious about structured learning paths and clicks on the 'Certifications' link in the navigation menu.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Certifications' link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the certification pathways page showing cards with pathway names, descriptions, and required courses in indigo text.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Related Courses
narrative_steps.description: Casey selects the 'Cybersecurity Specialist' pathway and wants to see the courses included in this track.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'View Courses' button on the certification card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Course catalog is filtered to display only courses associated with the selected certification pathway.

requirement_tested: Ensure all pages have a lavender background and indigo components styling
user_persona: A visually-oriented learner checking the website's appearance.
user_goal: To experience a consistent color scheme throughout the site.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Multiple Pages
narrative_steps.description: Morgan explores various sections of the website including Home, Courses, and Contact to assess visual consistency.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate between different pages using the main navigation menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each page maintains a lavender background with indigo-colored headers, buttons, links, and form elements consistently applied.

requirement_tested: Fetch course data dynamically from backend APIs
user_persona: A returning student checking for new course additions.
user_goal: To see the most up-to-date course listings.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Course Catalog
narrative_steps.description: Riley returns to the course catalog page and expects to see any newly added courses.
narrative_steps.action: Load or reload the course catalog page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend makes an API call to /api/courses, retrieves latest course data, and populates the page with current information.

requirement_tested: Connect backend to PostgreSQL database using provided environment variables
user_persona: A developer deploying the application for production use.
user_goal: To ensure the backend connects properly to the PostgreSQL database.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Application Server
narrative_steps.description: Devon deploys the backend server and verifies that it connects to the PostgreSQL database upon startup.
narrative_steps.action: Start the backend server process.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Server initializes database connection using environment variables (DB_HOST, DB_PORT, etc.) and establishes a successful connection pool.

requirement_tested: Support user authentication for enrollment functionality
user_persona: A new user wanting to register and enroll in a course.
user_goal: To create an account and log in to access enrollment features.

narrative_steps.title: Registering New Account
narrative_steps.description: Patricia visits the website and wants to enroll in a course but first needs to create an account.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Login/Register' in the navigation menu and choose to register.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Registration form appears with indigo-styled input fields. After submission, account is created and user receives confirmation.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In
narrative_steps.description: After registering, Patricia logs in with her new credentials to access enrollment features.
narrative_steps.action: Enter username/email and password, then click login.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Credentials are validated, JWT token is generated and stored in cookie, and Patricia is redirected to the previous page with access to enrollment functions.

requirement_tested: Provide search and filter options for the course catalog
user_persona: A student looking for specific cybersecurity courses.
user_goal: To find relevant courses using search and filtering tools.

narrative_steps.title: Searching for Courses
narrative_steps.description: Quinn is interested in ethical hacking courses and uses the search bar to find them.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'ethical hacking' into the search bar on the course catalog page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Course list updates in real-time to show only courses matching the search term.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Filters
narrative_steps.description: Quinn refines results further by selecting 'Beginner' level and choosing a specific certification pathway.
narrative_steps.action: Check 'Beginner' difficulty level and select a certification pathway from the filter options.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Course catalog re-fetches and displays only beginner-level courses aligned with the selected certification pathway.

requirement_tested: Implement responsive design for all pages
user_persona: A mobile user accessing the website on a smartphone.
user_goal: To navigate the website easily on a small screen device.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Website on Mobile
narrative_steps.description: Drew opens the website on his smartphone and observes how the layout adapts to fit the smaller screen.
narrative_steps.action: Open website on a mobile device or resize browser to mobile width.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Navigation transforms into a hamburger menu, course cards stack vertically, and forms adjust to fit the screen while preserving lavender background and indigo styling.

requirement_tested: Include navigation menu with links to key sections
user_persona: A frequent visitor navigating between different parts of the site.
user_goal: To quickly jump between important sections of the website.

narrative_steps.title: Using Navigation Menu
narrative_steps.description: Bailey is exploring the website and uses the top navigation bar to switch between pages.
narrative_steps.action: Click on various links in the fixed header navigation menu (Home, Courses, Certifications, Contact).
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each click smoothly navigates to the respective section/page, with hover effects providing visual feedback on menu items.

requirement_tested: Add footer with contact information and quick links
user_persona: A user seeking additional resources and contact details.
user_goal: To find institute contact information and legal policies.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Footer Content
narrative_steps.description: Ashley scrolls to the bottom of any page to locate contact information and policy links.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll to the bottom of any webpage.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Footer displays consistent contact info, quick links (Privacy Policy, Terms of Service), and social media icons, all styled with indigo text on lavender background.

requirement_tested: Configure package.json with install:all and dev scripts for frontend and backend
user_persona: A developer setting up the project locally for development.
user_goal: To set up and run both frontend and backend services efficiently.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Dependencies
narrative_steps.description: Corey clones the repository and needs to install all frontend and backend dependencies.
narrative_steps.action: Run 'npm run install:all' in the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dependencies are installed in both frontend and backend directories sequentially without errors.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: With dependencies installed, Corey wants to start both development servers simultaneously.
narrative_steps.action: Run 'npm run dev' in the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend development servers start concurrently in the same terminal session, ready for development work.
